content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm pleased to meet you. Let's focus on the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see you are a student. Considering that the apartment is in the city center and has a good location, I think a price of 650 Euros per month is fair.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too low for the prime location of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's say we offer a price of 670 Euros per month. That would make it more affordable for you as a student.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is still not high enough for the excellent location of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's meet somewhere in the middle. How about 680 Euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is still not high enough for the prime location of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can see you are a smart person, Yi-Nuo. Let's make a deal at 690 Euros per month. That's the lowest I can go.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Let's make it 690 Euros per month, Yi-Nuo. That's the best offer I can provide.
[](/user/ Response)
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I already agreed to the price of 700 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
